philosophy: Reliability First, followed by Aggressive Deployment
known_weak_points: OEM plastic charge pipe (fails under boost)
HPFP (High Pressure Fuel Pump) - fails above 400whp
Stock ignition coils under high boost

phase_1.name: Structural Integrity (Reliability)
phase_1.goal: Address weak points before increasing power

upgrades.name: Upgraded Charge Pipe
upgrades.reason: OEM plastic unit fails under increased boost
upgrades.recommendation: Aluminum replacement with TiAL or HKS BOV flange

upgrades.name: Coil Packs
upgrades.reason: Factory coils fail under sustained high boost

upgrades.name: Oil Catch Can
upgrades.reason: Mitigates carbon buildup on intake valves

phase_2.name: Thermal Management & Airflow (Stage 2)
phase_2.goal: Optimize intake/exhaust flow, prevent heat soak

upgrades.name: 7.5" Stepped Front Mount Intercooler (FMIC)
upgrades.reason: Keeps Intake Air Temps stable during multiple pulls

upgrades.name: Catless Downpipes
upgrades.reason: Single most significant upgrade - reduces backpressure, faster spool
upgrades.legal_warning: Not legal in all states - check local emissions laws

upgrades.name: Dual Cone Intakes (DCI)
upgrades.reason: Increases air volume, signature twin-turbo sound

upgrades.name: Relocated Inlets
upgrades.reason: Optimizes flow path to turbo compressors

phase_3.name: Tactical Fueling (The Power Limit)
phase_3.goal: Push past 450whp with upgraded fuel delivery

upgrades.name: Stage 2 LPFP (Low Pressure Fuel Pump)
upgrades.reason: Required to support E85 blends and high boost

upgrades.name: Tuning Interface
upgrades.recommendation: MHD for most precise flash tuning

upgrades.name: VSS Custom ECU Tune
upgrades.includes: 2 free revisions to dial in specific logs

build_packages.name: Stage 1 (Street)
build_packages.description: Daily driver friendly, reliable power bump

build_packages.name: Stage 2 (Performance)
build_packages.description: Significant power increase, weekend warrior setup
warnings: Check wastegates for rattle before tuning
Not emissions legal in all states

build_packages.name: Stage 2+ (Aggressive)
build_packages.description: Maximum N54 power on stock turbos
warnings: Wastegates MUST be in perfect condition
Turbos nearing end of safe limit

vss_logistics.shipping: FREE Global Shipping on orders over $100
vss_logistics.warranty: 1-year warranty on all VSS branded parts
vss_logistics.tune_revisions: 2 free revisions included with custom tune

critical_warnings: Ensure wastegates are in good condition (no rattle) before Stage 2+ tuning
Increased boost will highlight any mechanical wear
Carbon cleaning recommended before major upgrades
Monitor coolant temps on track (N54 runs hot)
HPFP replacement recommended at 80k+ miles before tuning

stage_2: Walnut blast carbon cleaning every 30k miles

recommended_logs: Boost pressure - monitor for spikes or drops

ai_response_template:
Mission Control established. Welcome to the VSS Speed Global briefing for the BMW N54 platform.

The N54 is a legendary twin-turbocharged power plant, requiring precise calibration and hardware optimization. Our philosophy: Reliability First, followed by Aggressive Deployment.
